ProteinMatch
object in module proteinMatches

Description

a match with a protein decription and a list of PSM

Usage

ProteinMatch(protein, psms, optional);

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
proteinObject

the protein AC + sequence

psmsArray

the list of PSM

optionalObject

parameters

  • targetModification as a string eventually pointing to the modificaiton to be enhanced

Methods

  • getAminoAcidInfo()()

    For each amino acid covered by a PSM, get the position, coverage depth, the list of psms, eventually the selectedModification

    Returns
    Array

    a list of amino acid

  • getMyBestPSMs()()

    get only the best and valid PSMs. Tweak them and keep only the proteinRef that match the protein's one

    Returns
    Array

    of psms

  • getMyPSMs()()

    get the PSMs, but tweak them and keep only the proteinRef that match the protein's one

    Returns
    Array

    of psms

  • getPSMs()()

    get the PSMs

    Returns
    Array

    of psms

  • getProtein()()

    {Object} get the matched protein

  • getTargetAminoAcidWithTargetModif()

    get a list of amino acid info for all amino acid where the targeted modif has been found

    Returns
    Array

    of objects

  • getTargetModification()()

    if ever this proteinMatch has a target modification

    Returns
    String

    modification name
